ai.summary: A very short, easy walk along Bath Hard Lane in the UK, perfect for a quick outdoor break. The route is flat and accessible for most ages, making it suitable for families and casual walkers.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat, well-maintained path primarily paved, with a brief stretch of compact gravel. Urban surroundings with occasional views of greenery.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather before you go, wear comfortable footwear, and stay on the designated path. Be mindful of other pedestrians and any traffic at entry/exit points. Carry a phone for emergencies, and avoid walking in dim conditions.
recommended_gear: Phone with map or offline directions
Sunscreen and/or hat for sunny days
ai.best_seasons: All year round. Spring and autumn offer comfortable temperatures; summer is fine with sun protection; winter can be icy or slippery, so wear appropriate footwear.
